TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Dremus, title = Dremus, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dremus} }

S.FORM: === Dremus／Semun === Asi ka mgrebu niqan dremus waso sudu. . Ye mnkdalax inu peni dremus nii, mgrebu de mdremus kanna ka speriq ma waso qhuni. . Mdremus kana ka waso qhuni berah sapah mu mgrebu. . Niqan semun bobo waso btakan ka mgrebu.早晨竹葉上有露水.

=== Dremos／Semon === Asi ka mgrebo niqan dremos waso sodo. . Ye mnkdalax ino peni dremos nii, mgrebo de mdremos kanna ka speriq ma waso qhoni. . Mdremos kana ka waso qhoni berah sapah mo mgrebo. . Niqan semon bobo waso btakan ka mgrebo.早晨竹葉上有露水.
